body.p: There exscaped from the jail of Union County on the 7th inst a white man named Lewis Chapman under indictment for the murder of Van Austin. A man He is about 40 years of age 6 feet high, heavy built light hair & blue eyes --

Also a negro man Bob the property of Thos Harris, sentenced to be hung on the 11th December next ^for the murder of Johnson Harris^ -- Bob is about 20 years of age four five feet 6 inches high -- dark color -- compactly built left handed -- weighs about 160 lbs --
There has been no private reward offered for said Criminals

Yours &C.
Geo Johnson
Jailor of Union County

Reward
2 Cases
$250-
Union Co
Reward offered
17th Nov/63
